https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gGlDjU2exdE3wl6UnZ20uG6lQ2k.jpg When Rome was still in its infancy, Carthage was the dominant power of the Mediterranean. As Rome grew, Carthage remained its only great rival. It was that rivalry that drove Rome to utterly destroy Carthage, and massacre its people. Carthage: The Roman Holocaust
